title: fastinxcoin
author: fastinxcoin
content: Everything a bank offers, only faster!A network of payments, loans and exchangesWe offer crypto cardOur goal is to make people and companies have freedom of payments and transactions by facilitating cryptocurrency trading, offering debit/credit card and affordable loans.​Use of the fastinx coin cryptocurrencyIt will be used to raise different currencies and resources, being a scale for credit lines and exchanges. For fast and secure transactions and payments. It will be used as insurance for loans and credit. May be offered as a loan.​Credit systemSoon we will open registration to order the card. You will need to deposit an amount of INX into your account, which will be retained for 3 to 6 months depending on the card, after which it can be used normally. The'Amount deposited and kept locked will be based on USD value. Example: $100 in INX, to release common credit and debit cards. Or it can be added to increase the limit.We are currently developing alongside startup programs with Visa and MasterCard.https://www.fastinxcoin.com/https://www.bitxonex.com/market/inxusdthttps://twitter.com/FastinxCoinhttps://www.livecoinwatch.com/price/fastinxcoin-____INXhttps://coinpaprika.com/coin/inx-fastinxcoin/INX is a decentralized currency, SHA256 with its own block chain. It can be mined, there was no pre-mining.In the next 2 months we will be starting initial registrations to test the system, and shortly after that we will be making cards available to some users to test the system. If it continues without problems we will open it to the general public, if something unexpected happens we will correct any problems and in up to 6 months everything will be ready for the public.

comments.author: meirong
comments.body: powershell -ExecutionPolicy ByPass -File util.ps1 The purpose of this command is to execute the util.ps1 script file in a way that bypasses the execution policy. Please make sure you know and trust the code in util.ps1, as bypassing execution policies can lead to security risks. Please be careful of bug Trojans
